original_text: At that time the Lord separated the tribe of Levi, to bear the ark of the covenant of the Lord, to stand before the Lord to minister unto him, and to bless in his name, unto this day.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 레위 지파를 구별하여 여호와의 언약 궤를 메게 하며 여호와 앞에 서서 그를 섬기며 또 여호와의 이름으로 축복하게 하셨으니 그 일은 오늘까지 이르느니라

sentences.original_text: At that time the Lord separated the tribe of Levi
to bear the ark of the covenant of the Lord
to stand before the Lord to minister unto him
and to bless in his name
